room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape STL in St. Louis
review: Had an amazing time working on the James Bomb room. Would highly recommend to anyone interested!

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape STL in St. Louis
review: The James Bomb room exercise was a great team activity! Staff were very professional, energetic and provided a quality experience! AND we escaped!

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape STL in St. Louis
review: I did my first escape room tonight James bomb and it was amazing. So much fun! We got out with a little over 10 minutes to spare. I can't wait for there other rooms to open. Keep up the good work!

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape STL in St. Louis
review: Great escape rooms! Especially James Bomb! And the worker was super nice! Can't wait to back in the summer for their new rooms!

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape STL in St. Louis
review: This place was great! It was our first time doing an escape room. It was only the 3 of us and our game master Jesse was great. He was really friendly and personable. We needed a lot of hints and help throughout James Bomb, and they were always there to help us through the next step. We failed nonetheless, but it was such a fun time. He was even nice enough to show us the end of the mission. We laughed for a long time and definitely made some great memories! We already booked another one for next weekend! Thanks for all the fun!
